name: Лена
info:
• 简体中文名: 列娜
  • 别名: Lena
  • 性别: 女
detail: Lena, who has short purple hair, is introverted and can often be seen reading a book. She has been friends with Alisa for a long time, since the grew up in the same town, but their relationship has gotten more complicated over the years. During the game she develops a more open and outgoing character that may grow to be fond of the Semyon, but she might not be as innocent as expected. She has no problem with being alone and can sometimes be seeing practicing by herself, but nonetheless she still maintains friendships with other characters like Slavya.
